column1: good length, floated on off stump, blocked back to Mashrafe
just short of a good length and wobbles away outside off, Danushka hangs back and pushes the ball to the covers
wrong line from Mashrafe. Full and veering down the leg side, deflected away to the right of the keeper. Four leg byes
good length and angling away outside off, tip and run to mid-off. Shakib is hanging back there. He moves in, attacks the ball, but can't collect it cleanly. He was too eager to throw the stumps down

sloppy fielding from deep third man. Another boundary. Tharanga might send Bangladesh a thank-you note later. Short of a length and attached with width outside off, the SL captain cuts it firmly towards third man. The fielder runs around, dives, and lets the ball through his hands
back of a length and angling across off, opens the bat-face and taps to point
tossed on off, holds its line, from around the wicket, played back to the bowler with soft hands
another non-turner, length ball on off, defended back from the crease
pretty full and drifts in the air, inside-edged to square leg for one
flat and a hint of width outside off, Tharanga flashes a cut to point
full and angling into the pads, gently worked to midwicket for one more
short of a length on off, stands tall and punches a single to mid-on hanging back

three men from the off-side infield run back but this sliced hit evades them. Very full and cuts away outside off as Mashrafe rolls his fingers across this ball. Danushka does not spot it. He drives early and toe-ends it over the infield
shot. Overpitched outside off, only 128ks, Danushka lays into it. Pinged off the middle of the bat. Punched to the left of the bowler and to the right of mid-on

Three men follow the swirling ball on the leg side. Mushfiq, who has the big gloves, calls for it. Runs after the ball, tumbles, and pouches it safely. This was the cutter again from Mashrafe. Hip-high cutter, going away outside off, 118ks. Danushka does not spot the change-up again. He pulls early and splices the ball over square leg. Mushfiq completes a brilliant catch with the sun squinting into his eyes
short and wide outside off, Tharanga skips back and flays a cut straight to backward point
short of a length and angled in at the top of off stump, the left-hander gets behind the line in defence
tucked around the corner off the hips but straight to the fielder
full on off, no turn, defended back to him

fractionally short and outside off, Mendis moves back, opens the bat-face, and punches it crisply in the gap at the covers. Mendis was happy with just two. Tharanga pushes his partner for three. They get it in the end
short and slides in from around the stumps, Tharanga is right behind the line in defence again
full and straight on off, gets forward and pushes it to the right of the bowler. Mehedi attacks the ball and makes a tumbling save. Sabbir from cover pats the bowler on his head
quicker outside off, presses forward and drives to cover
good length on middle, played back to the bowler
back of a length and holds its line outside off, defended to cover
on a length and this wobbles away slightly outside off, Mendis opens the face and negotiates it to cover
very full and angling down the leg side, beats the glance, beats the keeper as well
this one keeps low, wide of the crease and comes into the left-hander. Tharanga stoops low and keeps it out
short and pushed into the hips, Tharanga does not connect with a pull properly. Flaps the ball to square leg
full and outside off, defended to point with an open face
short of a length and angled in on off, fended back to the bowler
straight full ball on middle, driven on the front foot to wide long-off
tossed-up offbreak on off, blocked back to Mehedi
length-ball offbreak, turns in, worked with the spin to midwicket
full and straight, Mendis plays back and works the ball straight to midwicket again
shortish, starts outside off, and spins back in, Mendis, having backed away outside leg, flashes to cover
this offbreak is worked with the turn again. This time Mendis finds the gap to the left of midwicket
just short of a good length and outside off, Mendis stands up tall, punching the ball to cover
back of a length and outside off, Mendis plays away from the body, flat-batting the ball to cover
short of a length and outside off, punched straight to cover-point. The off-side infield is heavily populated
back of a length and outside off, slapped to point
back of a length and outside off, punched straight to cover
length ball outside off, jumps from nowhere, and hits the splice of the bat and rounds out a maiden
very full and outside off, no turn, Tharanga reaches out for the ball, opens the face, and threads the gap between cover and point
much fuller, drifts in, Tharanga plays all around his pad, and misses the flick
tossed up on off stump, pushed down to long-off for one
turning offbreak, nudged with the spin through the square-leg region
another cover-drive, another boundary. Looped up outside off, Tharanga backs away outside leg, manufactures more room, and drills another open-faced drive. Finds the gap at cover
full on the stumps, another drive, this time he secures a single down to long-off
length ball angled in on leg from around the stumps, picked off through square leg
length ball angled in on off, this one skids off the surface and hits the bat as opposed to bat hitting ball. Squirted to cover
short of a good length and outside off, punched on the back foot straight to cover. Mendis struggling to find the gaps
full and wide outside off, Mendis plays away from the body. Pushes to cover-point and chances a single
picked off the hips just wide of short fine leg, he makes a diving stop
full offcutter outside off, makes Mendis reach out for the ball. Lovely bowling from Mashrafe. The batsman skews a drive back to the bowler.
good length and angled in on middle, Tharanga gets right behind the line in defence
back of a length and slanted in on off and middle, dropped defensively to cover
short and angled a long way down the leg side, nothing doing from Tharanga, wide called
short and outside off, this is the cutter, Tharanga reaches out for a cut and nearly drags it back onto the stumps
leg-stump half-volley, which is flicked away to deep square leg
this is even better from Tharanga. A bit too full and outside off, he leans forward and crunches the ball past extra cover
Mustafizur responds with a cutter, which grips in the surface, tip and run to mid-on. They chance a single and get away with it
starts off with a short delivery angling away, Tharanga uses the pace to steer this behind point to third man, who had to run around at least 20 yards to cut that off
plays outside the line of a short of length delivery, gets a thick inside edge to square leg
punches a short of length delivery to point. Taskin got that to lift a little more than Mendis expected

defended back down the pitch, Taskin can't stop that on his followthrough despite the dive. The ball deflects off Tharanga's bat to mid-off. Not intentional and he apologised straightaway to the fielding team
nips away from length on off stump, defended to point
floats this full on middle and leg, eased to mid-on
width on offer, square driven straight to Sabbir at point

definite chance missed! Genuine edge brought about by that length. Just a touch ahead of length and angling away, he looked to drive on the up and the ball flew between Mushfiqur and Mahmudullah at a wide slip. One of them should have gone for it.
gets inside the line and clips the full delivery to fine leg
driven past cover. The man from the deep was late to get off the blocks, the batsmen somehow manage to come back for the second this time. Mosaddek's throw wasn't flat either

off the pad and into the fine leg boundary. Too full, the ball pitched outside leg and so the lbw was off the picture straightaway. Kusal looked to flick it past square leg but was late on the shot. Runs nonetheless for Sri Lanka
dabs it gently between cover and point
floats this at length on the stumps from wide of the crease, turned to the leg side
whips a length delivery from outside off to deep backward square leg. Good wrist work
drops it gently to short midwicket and scampers across for a single
look to play a forceful drive through mid-off, only to get a thick inside edge to midwicket. 50 partnership off 63 balls.
uses the pace of the bowler and steers the away-going length delivery to third man
driven firmly but straight to mid-on
pushed back to the bowler
touch short, cut away to deep point. 'Keeper, keeper' yells Mushfiqur even before Mahmudullah could get to the ball. I wonder if that can put off a fielder
stretches forward and blocks
fired full and flat on middle, squeezed back to the bowler
turned with the spin past Shakib to long-on
drifting into middle, worked to midwicket where Tamim pulls off a diving stop
back of length delivery on middle and leg, worked to midwicket
lucky to not get a nick on that. Looks to cut but didn't quite have the width he would have liked. Beaten
punches a length ball to sweeper cover as he jogs the single

lovely, lovely drive. Shows the full face of the bat as he eases that length ball past the bowler. Bisects mid-on and mid-off. Superb timing. Not afraid to hit through the line. Signs of a cracking pitch
predictable reaction from a fast bowler. Digs this one short outside leg, Tharanga ducks under it
tests him with another short ball, this one at 140 clicks. Tharanga ducks under it without a hassle
rocks back and thrashes that short ball to deep cover. Should've been put away to the boundary. Plenty of open space behind square on the off side
punches a short delivery back to Shakib, who moves swiftly to his left to stop that
tossed up on middle and leg, eased to long-on
gets outside the line of the stumps and sweeps the in-drifter on middle with the spin to fine leg. Lovely timing and he played it all along the ground.
eased with the spin to short cover
worked across the line to midwicket
defends a length ball on off with a straight bat
looks to pick the gap between cover and mid-off, doesn't time it well.
slower and fuller on middle, dabbed to mid-on for a quick single
well-directed short ball on middle, Tharanga arches back and watches it through to the keeper. Looks like he initially thought of the upper cut
hops back and across in defence of the incoming short delivery
another short ball, this time directed towards the body. Tharanga ducks under it
swept from outside off to deep square leg
too  much flight outside off, driven through the line to deep cover
fired full on middle, swept again off the stumps to deep backward square leg. Loaded with risk. Plumb if he had missed
tossed up on off, not much turn, driven to cover
gets half a stride in as he defends that in-drifter
opens the face of the bat to steer this wide of cover. Sensible
too close for the glide but goes through, gets a thick edge down to fine third man. Could have so easily nicked that to Mushfiqur
forceful drive off the backfoot to deep cover. Mosaddek has to come in a fair bit by which time they're back for the second
pulled to deep backward square leg.
wants a single but is sent back. Tamim swooped in quickly from cover. He was unhappy that there was no one backing up at the striker's end
sways out of that short ball on middle
another short ball, this one's angling away from over the wicket. Tharanga watches it through to the keeper
worked from outside off to wide long-on
drifting into middle and leg, drives and gets a thick inside edge back to the bowler
worked with the angle to midwicket

slides back in to middle, he rocks back and cuts but didn't have the room. Somehow managed to put this away behind point. Big, big risk. Would've been lbw had that hit his pad. Could've been bowled too
worked down to long-on. 100 up. Platform set
fired full and flat on off, wristed to long-on
very full and holds its line outside off, presses forward and drives back to him
back of a length and angled in on middle, hangs back and clips it to deep square leg - one of the three men on the leg side
back of a length and holds its line outside off, carved away to square-ish third man
really full and outside off, forward and driven to mid-off. They hare across for a single
very full and angling in from over the wicket, Tharanga eyes up a cover drive but the bat-face turns on impact, skewed to midwicket off the inside half
full and angled in just a shade outside off, Tharanga stretches forward and pushes the ball back to Mustafiz
very full, dips and turns, too full for the sweep as Mendis does not make contact? Hit outside the line of off. Under-edged onto the front pad
length-ball offbreak, tucked away to deep square leg with the turn
shortish and just outside off, Tharanga miscues a cut
pitched up and outside off, belted to the right of the bowler, Mehedi flings his body and makes a smart stop
milked down to long-on for one
slightly short and outside off, no turn, Mendis skips back and drives in the gap at sweeper
full and angled in on off, driven straight to mid-on
lifting short ball outside off, Tharanga sways his body away from the line of harm
length ball outside off, offcutter? Tharanga opens the face and dabs it to the covers. Brings up a half-century in his 200th ODI
looks like a slower offcutter outside off, forward and pressed to cover
worked from off stump through square leg
picked off the hips through midwicket for one
skids on short and outside off, Tharanga goes on the back foot and cuts the ball away to sweeper cover
short and spins away outside off, allows Mendis to skip back and punch through the covers
another short ball outside off, cracked on the back foot to sweeper cover
keeps it short and just a shade outside off, Tharanga punishes Shakib. Jumps back and cuts it strongly to the left of sweeper cover
throws this one up on middle and leg, Tharanga simply knocks it along the ground to long-on
another short ball, spins away outside off, Shakib gets away with it as Mendis cuts it straight to point
short and outside off, not short enough, hip-high delivery Tharanga jumps back again, this is swatted over midwicket. Replays show Tharanga double-hit that ball unintentionally. Bizarre play
even shorter and outside off, bounces over the attempted cut
half-volley outside off, slower one, Tharanga picks it up and dispatches it over the bowler's head

high-full toss down leg - beamer - the square leg umpire calls it a no-ball, and there is a direct hit from Mahmudullah. Tharanga is caught short. He has to depart. This is even bizarre: run-out off a no-ball. Lucky break for Bangladesh. Mushfiq dives full-length to his right and deflects the ball to short fine leg. Tharanga dares to rush across to the other end. Mahmudullah, though, attacks the ball and nails a direct hit at the bowler's end
length ball outside off, Mendis drops to one knee and pastes a slog-sweep over long-on. Poor length and put away. First six of the game
very full and wide outside off, Mendis leans into the drive and creams it through the covers. Brings up a half-century of his own. Can Mendis press on?
tucked around the corner for one. What an over, all action
milked down the ground
worked to leg for one
short offbreak, punched through midwicket
tossed up on off, goes low and paddles a single to long leg
near yorker on middle and leg, dug out to midwicket
very full on off, driven to cover on the front foot
length ball, turns away, pushed to cover
down the track, takes it on the half-volley and drives to long-off
arm ball, more round-arm than usual, dinked to leg for one
short of a length on off, goes back and forces the ball to long-off
indrifter, nudged to midwicket
slower offbreak, Chandimal eyes a sweep, and manages a little tickle, which beats short fine leg to his right

not all that short, slog-pulled away to deep midwicket, where Sabbir throws himself to his right and makes a superb save, cutting down the angle. Long-on runs all the way to deep midwicket to congratulate Sabbir
goes low and sweeps a length ball to long leg
worked with the turn through midwicket
tossed up, comes in from wide of the crease. Mendis stretches across off, attempts a sweep, and is hit on the pad outside the line of off stump
swept away again, this time to deep square leg
flighted on off, ventures down the track and whips the ball to deep midwicket
slower through the air just outside off, uses his feet and secures a single to long-off
picked off the pads to deep square leg
worked away to the left of a diving short midwicket for one
speared outside off, arm ball, inside-edged onto the pad. The ball rolls back to the bowler
drifts in on off, worked with the drift through midwicket
full, straight ball on off, dabbed between deep midwicket and deep square leg for a double
length ball outside off, manipulated with the wrists in the gap at square leg. Mendis has settled down nicely after struggling early on
length ball outside off, driven to long-on
tossed on off, Mendis brings out a hard sweep. Deep square leg had moved to fine leg and he simply hits it to the left of the leg umpire to the boundary
long-hop on middle, Mendis jumps back and latches onto this loose ball. He pummels a pull to the midwicket fence
knocked with the spin to deep midwicket, 13 runs off the over
delightfully done. Skips down the pitch and wrists the tossed up delivery from off stump towards wide long-on. The fielder tried to pull it back in but couldn't. The ball gathered momentum
fired full on middle, squeezed to the bowler
appeal for caught behind as he looks to nurdle it behind square on the leg side. It deflected off the pad. The square leg umpire quickly indicated that to S Ravi. Doubts extinguished
fired full and into middle and leg, defended
sliding into the pads, tucked to short fine leg as they scamper across for a quick single
driven straight to cover.
starts off with a back of length delivery on middle and leg, worked to deep fine leg
width outside off, bunted to point where Sabbir slides to his right to stop it
shapes to cut but the length isn't there again, defended to point
whips a length ball from outside off to midwicket
floats it full on middle and leg, bunts it down to long-on as he jogs the single
uppish but worked with the angle to long-on
fired full on the stumps from around the stumps, worked to deep midwicket
pushed through quicker outside off, eased to cover
mid-on was in and so he steps out and lofts it over the infield. Didn't time it well but still got enough bat to power it into the boundary
steps out and drives with the spin to cover
drilled to wide long-off. Too much flight from Shakib
rocks back and pulls it over the infield to midwicket. Didn't time it well again
off-cutter around the fifth stump, defended gently
incoming length ball on middle, turned wide of midwicket
crunching cover drive past the outstretched hands of the fielder there

looks to work a length delivery across the line and misses. Hit in front of the stumps. The only point of consideration may have been the height. There was no inside-edge on it. Ball tracking indicates the ball would have clipped middle and leg. Umpire's call Looked a lot closer than that, really.
whipped into the deep square leg region
squared up by length but is still solid in defence
swing and a miss. Went for a slog across the line. Deep midwicket is vacant, but he played too early.
slides one in from wide of the crease, makes room and cuts it to deep cover
eased with the angle to mid-on. This was pushed through quicker
got too close to the ball, squeezed to mid-on again
just manages to hit it over midwicket. Looked to go over mid-on but ended up getting a thick inside edge. Lucky runs. He isn't too concerned of the impending landmark
another one. This is tossed up just a little more, as if to dare him to go over the top, and Kusal does just that. This time he connects and clears mid-on comfortably
direct hit from mid-on at the bowler's end would have made it very interesting. Shakib with the underarm throw. Risky from Chandimal.
slower delivery that grips and takes off, Kusal gets a thick edge down to third man
punched into the gap at deep point. Good work by Taskin, who comes in from the ropes quickly to cut that off
swivels back and helps a short delivery down to fine leg. Maiden ODI ton. The team-mates applaud a super knock. They know the value of this. Kusal himself isn't very animated about it.
steps out and then steers the short delivery to Tamim at square third man
top-edges a pull that lands between the keeper and third man. Mushfiqur was running back, Mosaddek was coming in. Nearly had a wicket immediately.
floats it full and wide outside off, he looks to reach out and squeeze it behind point but misses. Gave himself too much room
punches a length ball back past Mustafizur's outstretched hands, quick single taken

Sri Lanka have reviewed an LBW decision. S Ravi took a long, long time to raise the finger. Maybe they've gone up just because they thought the umpire wasn't certain. The appeal was a very strong one from the bowler and keeper. This is a length ball coming in from wide of the crease, Chandimal walks across the stumps to help it over short fine but is struck in front of the stumps. There was certainly no bat. The ball was in line with the stumps and would've hit middle and leg
drops it gently to the off side for a quick single
play and a miss. Full toss that could've been hit anywhere he pleased on the off side, but he swung too early
incoming length ball on middle and leg, helped to fine leg
full and tailing in from wide of the crease, squeezed down the pitch, bounced over Taskin
length ball outside off, uses the pace to run it down to third man

just imagine how hard this must have been hit if the bowler had enough time in the world to run back few steps after being hit hard on his followthrough and then complete the catch. Full, Kusal backed away and picked the bones out of it. Taskin is hit on the left shoulder but the ball pops up. For a second, he isn't sure where the ball is, but recovers, looks up, regains his composure and then runs back to complete the catch.
beaten by a beauty! Floats this across at length, went to drive on the up but missed it
get behind the line of the length ball and blocks
caresses the length ball into the cover boundary. Impeccable timing. This wasn't a cutter, so he just used the pace and ease it into the gap. Wide long-off had no chance
wrist an incoming length delivery to square leg
punched straight to cover
high full toss on middle and leg, hit straight to midwicket
driven into the gap at deep cover, they'll come back for the second quite easily
width outside off, cracked to deep point
dabs a length ball to the man coming in from point
into the pads, flicked to deep square
slower and fuller outside off, looks to ease it wide of point but finds the fielder
too short down leg, swivels back and then pulls him into the gap at deep square leg. This is hit superbly. Picked the length early and got into position nicely to execute that
doesn't get much better than that. Wow. Full and angling away, Siriwardena comes down in a nice little arc with a high elbow as he plays a near-perfect cover drive on the up.
pushed to Mosaddek, who does well to come in quickly from deep cover to cut that off
short on the pads, whipped through square leg on the back foot
hung up in the air on off, down the track and gently worked through the vacant spaces at midwicket
tossed up down the leg side, Siriwardana aims a sweep and misses, the ball evades the keeper as well
flat dart, slid across off, beats the leg-side slog now
flat again, no flight at all, fired across off, sliced off an outside edge to short third man
full-toss on the leg stump, Shakib gets away. Swatted straight to deep square leg
slightly short and outside off, chopped on the back foot to point, where Mahmudullah takes his eyes off the ball and concedes a single
tossed outside off from around the stumps, played back to Mehedi
short and speared across off, cut square to deep point
shorter and outside off, chopped to the right of the bowler
tucked to leg for one
full and angled across off, drags the batsman into a drive, Mushfiq fluffs a stumping chance. He can't collect the ball cleanly
full-toss on middle, pushed to the right of the bowler to long-on
chopped from off to cover
full on off, driven through midwicket for a double
length ball outside off, slower, reaches out and drives to cover
full and outside off, driven down to long-off on the front foot
short and angling away outside off, extra bounce, Siriwardana swishes and misses
darted into the pads, misses the flick, they get across for a leg bye. The lbw appeal is quickly shot down, this was clearly heading past the leg stump
tossed up on middle from around the stumps, mowed away to the left of deep midwicket. Powerful slog-sweep from Siriwardana
straight ball on off, nudged into the covers for one
flat on the pads from around the stumps, deflected through square leg for one more
another straight ball on middle, keeps a touch low, Siriwardana plays back and wafts it back to Mehedi
full and straight on off, pushed back to him with a straight bat
short turning offbreak outside off, Siriwardana throws his bat at the ball and watches an outside edge fly over point
back of a length and outside off, flashed away to the left of backward point and to the right of deep third man
floated on a length and outside off, dabbed away more or less straight to deep third man
back of a length on middle, Siriwardana backs away outside leg and glides the ball square through the off side
full and outside off, opens the face and runs a single to backward point

This is a skier. Dropped. Mehedi bolts in from deep midwicket, dives forward, and drops it under the lights. Banged in short and outside off, Siriwardana miscues a pull. Top-edged in the air. The ball hits Mehedi high on the hand and pops out
steered from the stumps through point
tossed on off, down the track and shovelled away to the left of Sarkar at long-on
opens the face and secures a single to point
tossed up on middle, swept away to deep square leg. Well controlled

Having dropped Siriwardana in the last over, Mehedi bowls his man. This was a straight ball from around the wicket. Credit to Mehedi for holding this back and holding his composure. Siriwardana goes for a big slog-sweep and does not make contact. Timbaaah
quicker arm ball, Thisara plays all around this full ball, pings the pad. Going down leg
tucked around the corner for one
full slower cutter outside off, chipped to wide long-on
back of a length on off and middle, another slower ball, toe-ended between wide long-on and deep midwicket for a double
shortish and outside off, bail-high ball. Thisara bisects deep midwicket and wide long-on now with a shovel pull

Mushfiq effects a direct hit and runs out Thisara. The square leg umpire raises his finger. Leg-stump ball, Thisara can't put bat on ball. Grazes the pad and rolls behind to the keeper. Thisara probably thinks it has passed the keeper and strays out of the crease, looking to get to the other end. He has to undo his steps. Mushfiq, removes his right glove, hunts the ball down, and over-arm throws it onto the stumps at the striker's end
length and outside off, guided down to third man

length ball outside off, Asela smites it over the man at deep square leg. We saw plenty of these in Australia. Flat, powerful hit, for the second six of the day. Mashrafe conceded only 30 off his first eight overs. The last two cost 25
banged short and outside off, upper-cut away over Mushfiq's head for four

Dilruwan backs away outside leg, Taskin follows the moving batsman, who swishes and misses. Mushfiq dives full-length to his left but the ball bounces just in front of him and rolls away to the fine leg fence
leg-stump full-toss, dragged to wide long-on
Asela backs away outside leg and belts a full ball to mid-off
the batsman steps away outside leg, Taskin chases him with a yorker, dug out to square leg off the inside half
very full and wider than a set of stumps outside off Taskin asks the batsman to reach out. Carved up and over the covers
short cutter, 117ks, grips in the surface, Dilruwan reaches out outside off and stabs it back to the bowler

Mushfiq effects another direct hit, this time he under-arms it onto the striker's end. Dilruwan premeditates by venturing a long way across the off stump. Mustafiz pushes a yorker wide past him. Dilruwan misses it and searches for a bye. He can't get back in time. The ball might have brushed the pad. Mushfiq swoops down on the ball and boom! He has had a great day with the big gloves
full-toss, angling across off, opens the face and drives the ball to sweeper cover
Asela shuffles across off for a cheeky lap, this looks like the offcutter, bounces up off the elbow and glances the helmet
wide full-toss wide outside off, might have slipped out of the hand. Off-side wide
full-toss really wide outside off, Mustafiz can't nail the yorker. Asela reaches out and simply slices it past backward point. This would have been an off-side wide had Asela left it
back of a length cutter outside off, bounces off the surface and defeats the cut
length and outside off, drilled to the covers for one
leg-stump full-toss, swatted square of fine leg for a boundary. This is a sparkling cameo from Asela
Asela holes out to mid-off. Really full and outside off, Asela drives it in the air. Mid-off is inside the circle, Sarkar times his jump well and holds onto a overhead catch

two wickets in two balls. Taskin is on a hat-trick. This is an innocuous full-toss on middle, Lakmal swats or rather flaps it away in the air, midwicket dives full-length to his left and grabs a smart, two-handed catch

Taskin does it. He does a Steve Finn or a Shane Bond. He claims a last-over hat-trick, pulls off a spread-eagled celebration, and sets off on a sprint. Pinpoint yorker, ripping inswinging yorker at 141ks, squeezes under the bat and clatters middle and off. Six wickets in the last five overs
